author: jtrube
title: Japanese Cardano Crash Course Video
description: Japanese interest in crypto and blockchain technology is growing, but many are still hesitant to invest or participate in a community.
solution: Produce a master class video in Japanese that introduces blockchain and crypto fundamentals, before showcasing what Cardano has to offer.
experience: Over a decade of event production and content creation in the Japanese market for clients such as Google, Porsche, Ralph Lauren, and more.
